solution_line_template: With {multiplier_gold_brown} times as many gold stripes as brown stripes, this means there are {multiplier_gold_brown} * {brown_stripes} = <<{multiplier_gold_brown}*{brown_stripes}={gold_stripes}>>{gold_stripes} gold stripes.

With five times as many blue stripes as gold stripes, this means there are {multiplier_blue_gold} * {gold_stripes} = <<{multiplier_blue_gold}*{gold_stripes}={blue_stripes}>>{blue_stripes} blue stripes.
